name: LGST 167
title: Politics of International Trade
description: Examines key issues in international trade, including  the distribution of gains, fair trading practices, and preferential trade agreements. Focuses on the political dimensions of trade, the rules of the international trade system, and conflicts within countries that international trade generates.

conditions.restricted_to_majors: legal studies majors during first and second pass enrollment.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to legal studies majors during first and second pass enrollment.
